Summarize the given piece of text. Mental Health is hugely important for one’s overall wellbeing and it is essential that everyone gives adequate attention to it. A healthy body cannot exist without a healthy mind. Here are some tips and advice to maintaining good mental health: Get sleep, exercise, eat nutritious food, maintain a healthy lifestyle, practice relaxation techniques, limit alcohol and drug use.

Add 3 examples to the following sentence. Gun violence in the United States can result in...

Categorize the following text into appropriate topics. In 2018, the most recent year for which data are available as of 2021, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) National Center for Health Statistics reports 38,390 deaths by firearm, of which 24,432 were by suicide. The rate of firearm deaths per 100,000 people rose from 10.3 per 100,000 in 1999 to 12 per 100,000 in 2017, with 109 people dying per day or about 14,542 homicides in total, being 11.9 per 100,000 in 2018.
Reorder the following words correctly to form a sentence. injuries | the | result | United | States | Gun | violence | of | thousands | tens

In 2018, the most recent year for which data are available as of 2021, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC) National Center for Health Statistics reports 38,390 deaths by firearm, of which 24,432 were by suicide. The rate of firearm deaths per 100,000 people rose from 10.3 per 100,000 in 1999 to 12 per 100,000 in 2017, with 109 people dying per day or about 14,542 homicides in total, being 11.9 per 100,000 in 2018.

Summarize the flow and ideas of the following paragraph. Cats have long been celebrated for their independence and mysterious nature. They possess a unique grace and an uncanny cunning in the wild, which makes them desirable pets. Despite their somewhat aloof attitude towards humans, they are generally incredibly loving and affectionate to the people they choose to bond with.
Write a headline for the following news story. The mayor of a small town in the Midwest took part in a charity drive that aims to bring books to underprivileged children in the area.

Summarize the following article in a few sentences. Rising temperatures in our planet’s atmosphere have many effects on the Earth’s environment, including disruption of ecosystems, declining crop yields, species extinctions, and increased extreme weather events, such as floods and heat waves. This global-scale disruption is caused by increased concentrations of carbon dioxide and other heat-absorbing gases originating from human activity, such as burning fossil fuels. This phenomenon is commonly referred to as climate change.
